name: Rocket Mayhem (Offlical)
description:
Please Read This Before Rating

Hey! This game was made in about 10 hours, and the last 10 hours of the game jam, the game is still a bit buggy with the audio on WebGL and kind of is really unbalanced and stupidly easy to beat. I tried to make a windows version that is balanced but then the grace period time ran out and i couldn't submit anymore any proper versions. Sorry!

Please rate the game as it is now, but if you wish to play the game in a better state, you can find it here: 

What's Rocket Mayhem?

Rocket mayhem is a game where you play as a space rocket driver, and you have to control all three rockets to get onto outer space,  but each rocket has a limtied amount of fuel, if you use them all at once you won't be able to get far! 

Rocket Mayhem is a game where you have to time out your rocket uses and how much of the power are you giving to each one to make it as far as you can.

Credits

Music was made by editjo on freesound.org, check out the song here: https://freesound.org/people/edtijo/sounds/240376/
All of the code & art were created by me, Offlical.

Game was made in about 10 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.
